Operation 'post-getNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description is too brief and lacks specificity. Missing information about required inputs (configuration ID), what specific details are returned, and the response schema structure. Enhanced description provides clarity on inputs, outputs, and helps AI agents understand what data to provide and expect.

data.current_description: Returns the details of the configuration of a notification subscription.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete configuration details of a specific notification subscription, including event types, endpoint URL, and status. Requires the notification configuration ID as input. Returns a NotificationConfigurationDetails object containing all subscription parameters and settings.
data.reasoning: Description is too brief and lacks specificity. Missing information about required inputs (configuration ID), what specific details are returned, and the response schema structure. Enhanced description provides clarity on inputs, outputs, and helps AI agents understand what data to provide and expect.

message: Operation 'post-getNotificationConfigurationList' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Description lacks clarity about the response structure and what information is included for each configuration. Enhanced description specifies that a list is returned with complete configuration details for each subscription, improving AI agent understanding of the output format and content.

data.current_summary: Get a list of notification subscription configurations
data.current_description: Returns the details of the configurations of all of the notification subscriptions in the platform of the executing user.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all notification subscription configurations for the executing user's platform. Returns a list of NotificationConfigurationDetails objects containing the complete configuration for each active subscription, including event types, endpoint URLs, and status information.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about the response structure and what information is included for each configuration. Enhanced description specifies that a list is returned with complete configuration details for each subscription, improving AI agent understanding of the output format and content.

message: Operation 'post-updateNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description provides important constraint about event type updates but lacks clarity on inputs and outputs. Enhanced description clarifies the requirement more explicitly, specifies what is returned, and helps AI agents understand the full-replacement semantics for event type configuration to avoid unintended data loss.

data.current_description: Updates an existing notification subscription configuration. If you are updating the event types, you must provide all event types, otherwise the previous event type configuration will be overwritten.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing notification subscription configuration with new settings. When modifying event types, all desired event types must be provided in the request; omitted event types will be removed from the configuration. Returns the updated NotificationConfigurationDetails object reflecting all changes.
data.reasoning: Description provides important constraint about event type updates but lacks clarity on inputs and outputs. Enhanced description clarifies the requirement more explicitly, specifies what is returned, and helps AI agents understand the full-replacement semantics for event type configuration to avoid unintended data loss.
